description:
Fred Savage (The Princess Bride, Austin Powers in Goldmember) and Justin discuss one of his favorite shows, The Wonder Years, both past and present, as they dissect what makes the reboot as special as ever and Fred shares the ins and outs of that infamous Seinfeld scene. 

You can catch The Wonder Years Wednesdays on ABC and stream it on Hulu.
